duties_responsibilities.duty: Achieve concrete public relations results for clients by engaging with reporters, producers, and media outlets to secure valuable placements.
Develop and maintain relationships with the media to win PR wins for clients and secure press coverage.
Pitch newsworthy ideas to local, trade, and national media, resulting in interviews and valuable placements.
Create and write press releases, client profiles, articles, and other assigned content.
Research and develop creative story angles to secure press and media coverage.

education_certification.credential: BA or BS in Public Relations, Mass Communications, Journalism, or related degree preferred.
1-3 years media relations, communications, publicity, journalism, or sales experience preferred.
